BACKGROUND.Living Situation: The respondent, Elsie, is 77 years old and lives in Green, Oregon with her husband and one son. Elsie does not drive anymore but utilizes online shopping to manage household needs, indicating a well-adapted lifestyle to her current circumstances.

BACKGROUND.Journey with SMA: Elsie was diagnosed with SMA in 1984 at the age of 36.
